actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Joint resolution to establish the effective date of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974 as January 1, 1975.

summary.text: Establishes the effective date of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974 as January 1, 1975, in order to provide for the regulation of futures trading and speculation through the enforcement of specific licensing procedures for brokers involved in sales under futures contracts.

titles.title: Joint resolution to establish the effective date of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974 as January 1, 1975.
